person.persName: Hervey Seaton (Louisville, Jefferson County, day policeman - 6th Ward)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, policeman. Kentucky native. Married to Ophelia Seaton. Father of Alexander Seaton, George T. Seaton, Ann G. Seaton, and William H. Seaton. Watchman in Jefferson County in 1850. Policeman in Jefferson County in 1860. Day policeman in the 6th Ward of Louisville in 1861.
